Name: Apóstol
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
10 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Snifter/Brandy balloon glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
FLAME cinnamon powder on a suitable surface and upend glass over smoking cinnamon and leave to capture smoke while mixing ingredients.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich and cinnamon spiced with chocolatey raisin, this stirred spirituous cocktail is a great after dinner cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Grace Tsai at Bar 21, Tainan, Taiwan.
